page.title: 12NEW ROMNEY CHURCHES TODAY
page.content: NEW ROMNEY HAS FOUR CHURCHES,METHODIST IN THE HIGH STREET,BAPTIST IN NORTH STREET ST AUGUSTINE'S ROMAN CATHOLIC CHURCH IN QUEEN'S ROAD AND THE PARISH CHURCH OF ST NICHOLAS IN CHURCH ROAD. NEW ROMNEY IS IN THE DIOCESE OF CANTERBURY AND THE VICAR OF ST NICHOLAS IS A CANON OF CANTERBURY CATHEDRAL ALL OF THE CHURCHES HAVE SERVICES AND SUNDAY SCHOOL ON SUNDAY, AND THE BAPTIST CHURCH HAS A MOTHER AND TODDLER'S GROUP AND A CLUB FOR CHILDREN CALLED WHIZZKIDS, WHERE GAMES ARE PLAYED.THE VICAR OF ST NICHOLAS IS ALSO THE VICAR FOR SOME OF THE OTHER MARSH CHURCHES AND HOLDS SERVICES IN THEM ON SUNDAYS.THE METHODIST BAPTIST AND ST AUGUSTINE'S ARE QUITE MODERN CHURCHES AND ARE MUCH WARMER IN WINTER THAN ST NICHOLAS WHICH IS OVER 900 YEARS OLD.
